entry.title: Basic Resume
entry.summary: Hi, I'm Litianyi, an undergradute currently studying in SIST, Shanghaiteh University, majoring in computer science and minoring in entrepreneurship and management. Recently doing research in Rhythmo, mainly on computer vision.
entry.content:
Hi, I'm Litianyi, an undergradute currently studying in SIST, Shanghaiteh University, majoring in computer science and minoring in entrepreneurship and management. Recently doing research in Rhythmo, mainly on computer vision.

🎓Education

————————————

High school affiliated to Fudan University, Pudong Campus

👶High school student
Gradution: 2020.7

Shanghaitech University (in reading)

👦Bachlor
Gradution: 2024.6(expecting)

💼Practice Experience

————————————

Shanghai Research Institute of Materials (2021.1-2021.2)

👨‍🔬Learnt to test the performance of Bluetooth Antenna by using HFSS.

💪Skills and Certificates

🤖Elementary programming skills on C/C++ and Python
🎃Elementary 3D modeling skills
🗣IELTS: 7.5 (2018.9-2020.9)
Driving License

🤞Interest

⚽️Sports: tennis, table tennis, soccer, cycling, hiking

🚘Knowledge about Automobiles
